articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Congratulations to Teaching Staff, Students of Korea University
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Congratulations to Teaching Staff, Students of Korea University
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Sunday sent a message of congratulations to the teaching staff and students of Korea University on its diamond jubilee.
					The full text of the message of congratulations reads as follows:
					
					I, in the name of the people in the homeland, extend warm congratulations and compatriotic greetings, along with the hearts of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, to all the teaching staff, students and graduates of Korea University who are celebrating their university's 60th founding anniversary at a meaningful time when the dignity and national strength of our Democratic People's Republic of Korea are being demonstrated on the highest level and a new era of prosperity is dawning in the country.
					
					The 60-year history of Korea University is a history of the deep, warm and ennobling affection for the compatriots and the nation cherished by the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu, who made every possible effort for the education of the younger generations of Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan), and a history of patriotic devotion with which the officials of Chongryon and other compatriots resident in Japan worked to safeguard their democratic national rights and promote national education. 
					
					Until the last period of his life since he had Korea University built in the heart of Japan as the supreme temple of democratic national education during the difficult period of postwar rehabilitation, President Kim Il Sung showed unstinting affection and benevolence for the development of Chongryon and Korea University. 
					
					It was under his warm care that, even when the country was facing economic difficulties, a large amount of educational aid funds and stipends were sent to the students of Korea University on a yearly basis; such a legendary tale of great love is unprecedented in the history of overseas compatriots' movement. 
					
					General Kim Jong Il made painstaking efforts to build up Korea University, which was developed under the President's close concern, into the base for training Chongryon officials where the ideological and leadership system of Juche has been thoroughly established, and into the "pedigree farm" for training native talents. 
					
					Despite his tight schedule for the Songun-based revolutionary leadership, the General met the teaching staff and students of Korea University, according them the greatest honour, and showed particular care and benevolence for the bright future of the university. 
					
					The paternal love he showed to train the children of Chongryon-affiliated compatriots into dependable successors to the patriotic cause permeates the whole of Korea University?faculties, educational system, curriculum, modern educational equipment, specimens of animals and plants, and campus. 
					
					Indeed, the President and the General were the founder and builder of our Korea University, benevolent fathers and mentors of its teaching staff and students, and Korea University is, both in name and in reality, the university of the President and the General, the DPRK's dignified, Juche-oriented university for overseas compatriots, which was founded and built up under the great leaders' benevolent care. 
					
					Over the past 60 years since its establishment Korea University, as the supreme temple of national education, centre of scientific research and bulwark for the preservation of the national identity, has rendered a great service to building up the organizations of Chongryon and developing the movement of Koreans in Japan under the wise guidance and warm care of the great leaders.
					
					In the past the teaching staff of the university have devoted their all to the national education of Chongryon without pursuit of any personal fame or reward, and its graduates have performed with credit the core role in developing the movement of Koreans in Japan by taking over the baton of love for their homeland and nation.
					
					Recorded in the chapters of the proud history traversed by the university are the ardent patriotic loyalty and devoted efforts of the university graduates and their parents and other compatriots from all walks of life in Japan who have worked with devotion for the development of Chongryon and the future of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					Because we have such dependable patriots who strive not for their own wealth and prosperity but solely for the development of national education and Chongryon, invariably following the road of patriotism on which nobody can easily embark in an alien land where money talks, the dignity of our country is further exalted and the baton of the patriotic cause of Chongryon is being carried forward reliably.
					
					Korea University, the one and only university in the world for a country's overseas compatriots, is indeed a source of great pride and honour for our country and nation and a precious asset for Chongryon and Korean compatriots in Japan.
					
					I extend warm thanks to all the teaching staff of the university, officials of Chongryon and other Korean compatriots in Japan who, as gardeners and foundation for cultivating the flower garden of national education of Chongryon, have rendered a positive contribution to founding and developing Korea University, upholding the great leaders' Juche-oriented idea of national education and leadership.
					
					Today, when the movement of Koreans in Japan has entered a historic stage of ushering in its new heyday holding the great Comrades 
					
					Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem in the vanguard of the Juche-oriented overseas compatriots' movement, Korea University shoulders a very heavy responsibility.
					
					In accordance with the historic mission and basic duty it has assumed before the times and the country the university should train all its students to be the backbone of the movement of Koreans in Japan and reliable successors to the patriotic cause, who are possessed with an ennobling spirit and profound knowledge, so as to continuously demonstrate its prestige and fame as the university of the overseas citizens of the dignified DPRK.
					
					The tradition of loyalty and love for the country and nation is the original feature and lifeblood of Korea University. 
					
					Korea University should champion and add eternal brilliance to the great leaders' immortal leadership exploits associated with it and establish in it the ideological and leadership system of Juche in a more thoroughgoing way, so as to train all its students to be the youth core who are fully equipped with the Juche-oriented outlook on the world and are ready to share life and death with their socialist homeland whatever the situation.
					
					It should produce a larger number of competent experts ideologically steadfast and well-versed in science and technology as demanded by the organizations of Chongryon and the community of Koreans in Japan, by establishing the Juche orientation in national education and putting the contents and methods of education on a patriotic, scientific and IT footing in line with the requirements of the movement of Koreans in Japan and the new century.
					
					In order to train students to be reliable youth core and patriotic talents who can shoulder the future of the movement of Koreans in Japan, teachers, who are in direct charge of education and edification, should become genuine revolutionaries and educationists.
					
					Teachers of Korea University, by steadily improving their political and ideological, scientific and technological qualifications, should ensure political and ideological character, scientific accuracy and applicability of the contents of education, and conduct all forms of education, including lessons and seminars, in conformity with the levels of the students and their ages and psychological features.
					
					Cherishing a high aim and beautiful dreams and ideals to shoulder the future of Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan, all the students of Korea University should learn and learn zealously, keep up-to-date with the reality of their prospering socialist homeland and breathe the same air as it all the time.
					
					The committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan at Korea University should prepare all the students as pillars of the patriotic cause, who are steadfast in their faith and ready to devote their all to their organization and collective, by establishing a revolutionary habit of studying and effectively conducting five-point education among students.
					
					National education is the lifeline and great foundation of the movement of Koreans in Japan which has a bearing on the destiny of Chongryon and determines the success or failure of its patriotic cause.
					
					Organizations, affiliates and other organs of Chongryon at all levels including its Central Standing Committee should bear deep in mind that the lifeline of the movement of Koreans in Japan is guaranteed by Korea University, the supreme temple of national education, take warm care of its students as their own flesh and blood, and vigorously advance the educational work of the university as an undertaking involving the whole community of Koreans in Japan.
					
					Bright and promising is the future of Korea University shining together with the august names of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu, and definite is final victory for Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan as there is a large contingent of reliable successors who are studying at this university, the "pedigree farm" for training the core of Chongryon.
					
					I firmly believe that Korea University will fully guarantee the long-term development of the Juche-oriented movement of Koreans in Japan by training reliable successors to the patriotic cause of Chongryon as intended and desired by the great leaders.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Moscow City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation headed by Nikolai Zubrilin, member of the Bureau of the Moscow City Committee and deputy to the Moscow City Duma, arrived here on Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Delegation of Organization for Study of Juche Idea of Thailand Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Organization for Study of Juche Idea of Thailand Arrives
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand led by Chairman Songchit Pullarp arrived here Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Gennady Kulikov, chairman of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Foreigners Here
articles.content:
Foreigners Here
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia headed by Chairman S. Sodbatar arrived here on Monday to take part in the 18th Kimilsungia Festival. 
					 Wang Wuji, director of the pictorial company of artists in China, came here on the same day.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Here
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Here
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the United Confederation of Koreans in Sakhalin Region, Russia led by Chairman Ri Ku Yul and Kim Kyong Ryol, vice-chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, arrived here Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas with the approach of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries.
					 It was handed to Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Martyr
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Martyr
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Wei-hua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Monday on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his assumption of the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket and congratulatory letter by the diplomatic corps here on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the 4th anniversary of his assumption of the post of the first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were handed to Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Monday by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the corps, and Roberto Colin, Brazilian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here and members of the UNICEF mission here Monday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President).
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Members of the economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests went round several places of the palace associated with the exploits of the peerlessly great men.

articles.title: British Delegation Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
British Delegation Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy led by Chairman Dermot Hudson visited the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) Monday. The delegation is visiting the DPRK to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Chief Jo Il Min and members of the mission had talk with the guests.
					
					 They informed each other of their organizations' activities and discussed the issues of strengthening solidarity.
					
					 Jo thanked Chairman Dermot Hudson and members of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy for having staged demonstrations and released statements in protest against the U.S. and its followers' sanctions and joint military drills against the DPRK and actively conducted activities for supporting the south Korean people's struggle.
					
					 Dermot Hudson said that his association would as ever further its solidarity activities for supporting the AINDF and the south Korean people in their struggle for building a democratic society and achieving national reunification against the U.S. imperialists' colonial rule.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Meet at Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Meet at Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Officers and men of the Army, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army held a ceremony at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday to pay high tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and take an oath to be loyal to supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					 Present at the ceremony were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Myong Su and commanding officers of the KPA and officers of the Army, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA and cadets of the military academies at all levels.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A speech was made by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The President founded the immortal Juche idea, Songun idea and led the two revolutionary wars and social revolution of various phases and socialist construction to victory, turning the DPRK into a powerful socialist nation, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the DPRK into an invincible political and military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state with his energetic Songun revolutionary leadership and ushered in a new era of prosperity with his patriotic devotion.
					
					 Glorified forever will be the immortal feats performed by the Generalissimos by which they put the dignity of the party, state, army and people on the highest level and laid an eternal foundation for firmly guaranteeing the victorious advance and bright future of the revolutionary cause of Juche while blazing a trail of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The speaker underscored the need to hold in high esteem the Generalissimos and accelerate the day of a final victory, true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un with loyalty.
					
					 There took place a march-past of the officers and men of the Army, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA and cadets of the military academies at all levels and students of revolutionary schools.

articles.title: 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Opens
articles.content:
30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Opens
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival opened with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Monday.
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Vice Premier Kim Yong Jin, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials concerned, citizens, artistes of various countries, foreign delegations and delegates, overseas Korean artistes, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here, military attaches and staff members of foreign embassies here and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam, chairman of the festival organizing committee, said in an opening speech that the festival has promoted friendship, solidarity, exchange and cooperation among countries and nations and contributed to human culture by giving successful performances with songs praising the great men and songs of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 He expressed belief that the participants of the festival would proudly show the excellent cultural tradition and development of arts in their countries and nations, deepen friendship and swap precious successes and experience through the performances.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made. 
					
					 Cuban Vice-Minister of Culture Carvajal Perez Kenelma, said that the Cuban artistes have traditionally taken part in the festival with friendship. She expressed will to contribute the development of the relations between the two countries through exchange in art field.
					
					 Ivan Gromakov, head of the Stavropol Cossacks State Dance Company, wished success in the festival in praise of the greatness of Kim Il Sung, founder and eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 Sogni Giuliano, conductor of the Young Philharmonia Italian Orchestra, said that it's her honor to conduct "Song of General Kim Il Sung", the immortal revolutionary hymn, at the opening performance of the festival.
					
					 Then a performance was given by Korean artistes.
					
					 The festival will last till April 17. It will involve group, individual and joint performances at various theaters here.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Officials, Members of Women's Union Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Officials, Members of Women's Union Held
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of officials and members of the women's union took place at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Monday on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The dancing party began with song "Our Leader Loved by People".
					
					 The dancers extended the greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un, who leads the great party and the great Paektusan nation to victory.
					
					 They danced to the tunes of such songs as "People's Country", showing the happy appearance of the Korean women who create a beautiful future with love and devotion and enjoy a worthwhile life under the leadership of the party.
					
					 They expressed boundless pleasure and joy of the Korean women who push one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot as the mistresses of the country under the care of the great sun, revving up the atmosphere.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place Monday across the country on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and the state.
					 Dancing parties began with song "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and "Joy of the People" at the venues of dancing parties in Pyongyang including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 The participants danced to the tunes of such songs as "Our Leader Loved by People", which expressed boundless reverence and thanks to Kim Jong Un for bringing into a shining reality the people's dreams and ideals.
					
					 Songs like "Youth and Courage" and "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party" reverberated far and wide.
					
					 Dancing parties were also held at provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Workers, Peasants Meet
articles.content:
Workers, Peasants Meet
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- There took place meetings of workers, trade union members, agricultural workers and agricultural workers union members at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding and the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm of Sadong District on Monday to observe the 4th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as the first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Reporters and speakers said it was a great honor and fortune of the party and revolution, state and nation, and a historic event of great significance in the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche that he was held in high esteem as the first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 His assumption of the above-said posts ensured the successful succession to the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun, they added.
					
					 They called for remaining loyal to Kim Jong Un who is ushering in the greatest heyday of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Art Squad of Youth League Gives Performance
articles.content:
Art Squad of Youth League Gives Performance
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave a performance at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding on Monday to mark the 4th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and state.
					 Put on the stage, which started with narration and song "Glory to General Kim Jong Un" and "Joy of the People", were such colorful numbers as mixed quartet "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and dialogic poem "Great Succession".
					
					 Other numbers truthfully represented enthusiasm, optimism and militant spirit of the young people who are fully demonstrating their spirit and mettle as members of the huge army of the youth.
					
					 The performance ended with mixed chorus "We Know Nobody but You".
					
					 Among the audience were youth, students and working people in the city.

articles.title: Building-Fixtures Exchange Exhibition in DPRK
articles.content:
Building-Fixtures Exchange Exhibition in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Three-Revolution Exhibition House in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, runs a building-fixtures exchange exhibition.
					 According to Kim Hyon Chol, section chief of the House, the exhibition was established in November Juche 103 (2014) and it has a significant role to play in the nation's architectural development.
					
					 Its mission is to ensure the dissemination of science and technology and the exchange of technologies and products.
					
					 Displayed there are thousands of kinds of building-fixtures presented by building-materials institutes and some 100 building-materials production units.
					
					 They include wainscot, ceiling board and shutter board made of light burned magnesia, household furniture and utensils made of natural stone, functional and waterproof paints, multi-purpose tiles, granite detergents and various kinds of sanitary wares, produced this year.

articles.title: Gravity-fed Waterway Project in DPRK
articles.content:
Gravity-fed Waterway Project in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A project for Chongchongang-Phyongnam irrigation gravity-fed waterway is now progressing apace in the DPRK.
					 In recent 40 days alone, its builders removed 200 000 cubic meters of earth and excavated 17 000 cubic meters of bedrock for waterway tunneling. And they filled earth of 50 000 cubic meters to lay a cofferdam for the construction of intake dam.
					
					 This project is one of the undertakings under the Workers' Party of Korea's grandiose plan for nature remaking.

articles.title: Great Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for Global Independence
articles.content:
Great Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for Global Independence
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) ? With the approach of the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Korean people and world progressives are recalling with deep emotion the immortal feats the President performed for the cause of global independence.
					 Kim Il Sung liberated the country from Japan's colonial rule, and thus set an example for national liberation struggle in colonies and encouraged the oppressed people of the world in their struggle for national liberation.
					
					 He rendered unreserved assistance to the countries in their struggle for independence against imperialism.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he helped the revolution in China at the cost of blood and deterred the Japanese imperialists from invading the Soviet Union through fierce harassment operations behind enemy lines.
					
					 After the liberation of the country, he dispatched a large number of elite Korean fighters and gave every possible logistic support for the victory in the war to liberate Northeast China.
					
					 After the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), he had regarded it as a noble international obligation to help peoples of Asia, Africa and Latin America in their struggle for national liberation against imperialism and building a new society and extended full support and encouragement to them.
					
					 He had forged intimacy with many party and state leaders and political and public figures of different countries in the world, desirous of independence and made efforts to strengthen the friendly bonds with the countries supporting the Korean people in accomplishing the cause of justice.
					
					 Among people who boundlessly revered the President, fascinated by his noble personality were those who differed from him in idea and political view.

articles.title: U.S. Is Wholly to Blame for Tension on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Is Wholly to Blame for Tension on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The highest-ever tension is prevailing and a nuclear war is looming on the Korean peninsula.
					 Commenting on it, the Algerian newspaper El Khabar said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea have staged joint military drills on the Korean peninsula every year only to keep the regional situation tense but the situation is the tensest-ever this year. It is because the on-going joint drills are targeting the supreme leadership of the north.
					
					 The chairman of the World Peace Council said that the U.S. and its allies are pursuing the sinister goal of bringing down the socialist system of Pyongyang by force, adding it is part of Washington's scenario to carry out its strategy of dominating Asia and a war scenario against independent countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran blamed the U.S. for persisting in reckless nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK for decades.
					
					 This is the unanimous view of the international community on the aggressive nature and gravity of the joint military drills being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The on-going biggest-ever nuclear war drills involving huge troops of the U.S. and south Korea and all nuclear strategic weaponry of the U.S. are seriously harassing peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of the region.
					
					 The gravity is that the drills are aimed to realize the hideous criminal scenario of eliminating the supreme leadership of the DPRK that represents the destiny, future and life of the Korean people.
					
					 The "operation for advancing into the depth of the north", "operation for occupying Pyongyang", "beheading operation" and "precision strike drill" were openly staged.
					
					 This reckless saber-rattling of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces is the most undisguised blatant challenge to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and an open declaration of war against it.
					
					 The reality clearly proves what is the root cause of the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is entirely attributable to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills and the hostile policy being pursued by the White House toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is now busy making profound confusion of right and wrong by creating impression that the tension on the Korean peninsula was caused by the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons. But this is no more than rhetoric to cover up the aggressive scenario of the U.S. administration to "topple" the DPRK dynamically advancing, holding aloft the banner of independence, and lay a springboard for dominating the region.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is a due measure for self-defence to cope with the outrageous military threat being posed by the U.S. to seriously impair the dignity and prestige of the DPRK and to wantonly abuse the right of its people to existence.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal that compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons and bolster them up.
					
					 When the U.S. gets more desperate in pursuing its nuclear war strategy and goes more reckless in its joint war drills to carry it out, the DPRK's nuclear deterrent gets stronger.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear weapons are symbolic of justice and peace.
					
					 The DPRK's bolstering its nuclear weapons strike capability is entirely designed to increase its muscle for deterring the aggression and war of the U.S.-led hostile forces and thus prevent the nuclear disaster on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK has never invaded other countries and the Korean people set store by peace more than any others.
					
					 If the U.S.-south Korea joint war drills targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK show any slight sign of going over into an actual war, the DPRK will launch a merciless preemptive nuclear attack to reduce the enemy bases to ashes. This is the firm will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will no longer tolerate the reckless nuclear war drills of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. and S. Korean Regime of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. and S. Korean Regime of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A month has passed since the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime kicked off the large-scale joint military exercises against the DPRK but this saber-rattling is still going on, extremely ratcheting up the military confrontation and tension on the peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 These unprecedented provocations of the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors against the DPRK are thrice-cursed criminal acts to deprive the DPRK of its sovereignty and right to live and inflict a nuclear war disaster upon the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S.-led hostile forces are now unprecedentedly escalating the moves to stifle the DPRK in all fields including politics, economy and military affairs in the wake of adopting the outrageous "resolution on sanctions" against it at the UN Security Council over its measure for bolstering nuclear deterrent for self-defence and its legitimate activities to develop space. 
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye is going on the rampage just like a mad woman, taking advantage of the extremely reckless moves of the U.S. for aggression against the DPRK as a good opportunity to stifle it.
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to bolster up the nuclear deterrence for self-defense in every way to cope with ever-escalating provocations of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors. 
					
					 They are to entirely blame for the tension prevailing on the Korean peninsula and the DPRK's measures for bolstering up the capability for self-defence are just counteractions for frustrating the hostile forces' moves to ignite a nuclear war against it.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group should be held wholly accountable for the grave situation prevailing on the peninsula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye of Crying out for Pressurizing North to Dismantle Its Nukes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye of Crying out for Pressurizing North to Dismantle Its Nukes
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- At the recent "Nuclear Security Summit" held in the U.S. traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea talked rubbish that "the north would meet self-destruction if it refuses to dismantle its nukes" and "sanctions and pressure are the only way of forcing the north to dismantle them", begging outside forces for "cooperation" in the international campaign against the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Her disgusting behavior proves that she will remain changed in her bad habit of hurting the fellow countrymen with the backing of outsiders till she meets death.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. that has threatened global peace and security with nuclear weapons and made ceaseless nuclear blackmail against the DPRK for several decades, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is quite natural that unless the empire of evils' nuclear threat is defused, the DPRK has to bolster up its nuclear strike capability for self-defense to protect its sovereignty and vital rights, instead of "dismantling its nukes."
					
					 "Sanctions and pressure" and "change" of the DPRK touted by Park, pinning hope on international cooperation in the confrontation with it are, in fact, no more than a poor fuss of a loser in utter despair.
					
					 No matter how zealously Park may implore outsiders to hurt the DPRK, clinging to their coattails, it will advance faster and is sure to win a final victory.
					
					 She is taking much pain to prolong her remaining days after committing high treason but it is too late.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slashes at S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slashes at S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors recently invited the U.S. envoy for the "human rights issue in north Korea" to south Korea to have a confab on the "improvement of human rights" in the north. It was also busy letting the riff-raffs of conservative bodies and human scum who betrayed their country and parents meet its American master.
					 Minju Joson Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is no more than a farce of human rights abusers to block the advance of the DPRK.
					
					 "Human rights issue" can never exist in the Korean-style socialist society centered on the popular masses in which the working people have become masters of the state and society and exercised their rights to the full, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 This is recognized by every foreigner who visited the DPRK.
					
					 However, the U.S. politicians and the puppet group are reluctant to acknowledge the existence of such an ideal society as the DPRK on the planet.
					
					 Clear is the sinister aim sought by the puppet group in its fuss of inviting the U.S. envoy for the "human rights issue in north Korea" and taking into account the UN "office on human rights in north" in south Korea.
					
					 The aggressors and provocateurs much upset by the tremendous military power of the DPRK are working hard to attain through their smear "human rights" campaign against it their sinister goal of invading it which they find it hard to achieve by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group are politicizing and internationalizing the non-existent "human rights issue" in the DPRK in a bid to tarnish its dignified image. This is one more unpardonable hideous crime.

articles.title: Great Paektusan Nation Is Sure to Win: Newspapers
articles.content:
Great Paektusan Nation Is Sure to Win: Newspapers
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Monday editorially observe the 4th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state. 
					 Holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK was a great political event and a great national jubilee which marked a landmark of an epochal turn in the drive for strengthening the party and building a thriving nation, newspapers say.
					
					 The past four years represent a period of important significance in the destiny and future of the WPK and the country which have a history of more than seven decades, Rodong Sinmun says, adding:
					
					 In this period Kim Jong Un, possessed of gifted ideological and theoretical wisdom, rare leadership ability and noble popular traits, strikingly demonstrated his personality as a peerlessly great man.
					
					 His experienced and tested leadership has brought about such miracles of history as perfectly carrying out urgent tasks of the times arising in the party building and state activities without any slight deviation and turns and twists and made it possible for the flags of the WPK and the DPRK reflecting the destiny of the people fly high and ushered in a new heyday of national prosperity startling the world. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un proclaimed the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of our party at the outset of the new century of Juche and set it as the eternal strategy of our revolution to keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism. This is a noteworthy event of our party and the history of the country.
					
					 He has adorned the whole course from the day he began leading our party and state up to this date with his iron faith and will to creditably carry forward the Songun revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un, regarding Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven as his lifetime maxim, has wisely led the work to thoroughly embody the people-first doctrine in all fields of party and state activities.
					
					 Minju Joson says that no force on earth can block the army and people of the DPRK dynamically advancing full of faith in victory and optimism,    holding in high esteem Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the party and state.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Termed Military Provocation in Japan
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Termed Military Provocation
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- 72 organizations of Koreans in Japan and Japanese civic organizations released a joint statement on April 5 condemning the U.S. for escalating military tension on the Korean peninsula by holding north-targeted joint military drills.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime have applied the OPLAN 5015 to the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises that have been staged since Mar. 7 with hundreds of thousands of troops involved, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The plan, which allegedly envisages mounting a preemptive attack in case the north shows even the slightest sign of using its nuclear weapons and launching missiles, contains even the sinister "beheading operation" against the leadership of the north.
					
					 The joint military drills for carrying out the plots are, indeed, the worst military provocation.
					
					 The statement blamed the U.S. for having kept its troops in south Korea since the conclusion of the armistice agreement and escalating military tensions by staging a series of large-scale joint military drills.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to halt the war games and opt for concluding a peace treaty.

articles.title: Diplomas Awarded to Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu by Peruvian Communist Party
articles.content:
Diplomas Awarded to Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu by Peruvian Communist Party
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un were awarded diplomas by the Peruvian Communist Party in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A ceremony of conveying the diplomas took place in Lima on April 5.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Peruvian Communist Party said that the C.C., the Peruvian Communist Party unanimously adopted at its plenary meeting a decision on awarding the diplomas to great leaders of the Korean people Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and supreme leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Un in recognition of their great exploits in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the WPK. 
					
					 I deem it great honor to courteously convey the diplomas conferred upon them on behalf of the Peruvian Communist Party, he added. 
					
					 He conveyed the diplomas to the DPRK ambassador to Peru.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Show Opens in Guinea
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Show Opens in Guinea
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The show of Kimilsungia, immortal flower, opened in Conakry, Guinea on April 1 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 On display in the venue were photos on the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books introducing their exploits and Kimilsungias in full bloom.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were personages of the Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association of Guinea, the Presidency, the Ministry of Culture and Heritage, the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, Conakry Botanical Garden and a broadcasting service and other masses.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in his speech said that Kimilsungias are in full bloom in Guinea thanks to the ardent reverence of the Guinean people for Kim Il Sung who made undying contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The manager of the broadcasting service said that the more one looks at Kimilsungia, the deeper impression one has, expressing the will to give wide publicity to the flower of the sun and make positive efforts for the development of the friendly relations between Guinea and the DPRK.
					
					 The participants looked around the venue of the show.

articles.title: Guinean Organization Introduces Kimilsungia
articles.content:
Guinean Organization Introduces Kimilsungia
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association of Guinea issued its special bulletin on April 1 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bulletin carried an article titled "Chapter 1 Kimilsungia appears in world horticultural arena" and "Chapter 2 Reflection of the progressives' desire" under the headline of "Birth of Kimilsungia".
					
					 It introduced in detail how Kimilsungia, the flower of the sun named after Kim Il Sung, was born, adding:
					
					 The birth of Kimilsungia was the precious fruition of all peoples' attraction and trust in him and a reflection of the times and desire of mankind to name the most beautiful and rare flower after him.
					
					 His personality as the great man is being acknowledged by the world.
					
					 The bulletin introduced the fact that the flower of the sun is well-known in the world horticultural arena and said that Kimilsungia born amid the attraction and reverence of all people is enjoying the worldwide attention, being loved as the most famous flower and treasure common to mankind for its beauty and the story behind its birth.

articles.title: Organizations of Koreans in China Urge Japan to Liquidate Past Crimes
articles.content:
Organizations of Koreans in China Urge Japan to Liquidate Past Crimes
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Officials of organizations of Koreans in China released statements accusing the Park Geun Hye regime of overlooking the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, the hideous crime against humanity, and urging Japan to liquidate its past crimes.
					 Ri Sol Hui, vice-director of the Secretariat of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China, said that traitor Park Geun Hye flattered and yielded to Japan which worked hard to nullify its past crimes, pursuant to the U.S. behind-the-scene plot and scenario and thus revealed her sycophantic true colors as the U.S. colonial servant and Japan's disgusting prostitute.
					
					 Rim Myong Sun, vice-chairperson of the Mudanjiang Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, said that Japan should liquidate the crime related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army as it was the hideous crime committed by Japan in an organized way under the state sponsorship.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Urge UNSC Not to Follow U.S.
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Urge UNSC Not to Follow U.S.
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The UN Security Council should stop following the U.S.!
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on April 3.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK requested the UNSC to convene an emergency meeting as regards the fact that the U.S. is kicking off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises for aggression despite the international community's unanimous denunciation.
					
					 However, the UNSC turned down the complaint of the DPRK.
					
					 This clearly proved that the UNSC is the puppet and stooge of the U.S.
					
					 The UNSC forfeited all its moral prestige, legality and even impartiality as it was reduced into the bugler of the U.S. imperialists' criminal and aggressive war policy and state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 There are no political and legal justifications for taking sanctions against the DPRK as the measures taken by it for self-defense are aimed at protecting its sovereignty and ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever exercise its just right to self-defense.

articles.title: Regional Body Censures U.S. and Its Followers' Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Regional Body Censures U.S. and Its Followers' Moves against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea issued a statement on April 5 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges' moves for stifling the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The UN Security Council, which has been dishonored, is resorting to the hostile moves against the DPRK while asserting that it is "threatening" peace, being pursuant to the U.S.
					
					 However, the U.S. and its followers' censure of the DPRK is sheer fabrication.
					
					 The DPRK is bolstering up its self-defensive nuclear deterrent to guarantee the country's sovereignty and prosperity and safeguard world peace and security from the hostile forces' moves for aggression.
					
					 We should make the people clearly understand that all the moves against the DPRK are aim at checking Korea's reunification and development.

articles.title: Japanese Personages Accuse U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Japanese Personages Accuse U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Japanese figures sent letters of request to the U.S. president and the U.S. ambassador to Japan on March 22 and 26 in denunciation of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces.
					 The secretary-general of the Kanagawa Prefectural People's Society for Promoting the Normalization of Japan-DPRK Diplomatic Relations said:
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises are aimed at launching a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK and undermining its supreme headquarters.
					
					 These are clearly the military provocation against the DPRK and act of harassing peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to immediately stop its joint military drills with south Korea and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 The secretary-general of the Kanagawa Prefectural Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans disclosed the scale and aggressive nature of the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills and strongly demanded the U.S. immediately stop its dangerous moves for igniting a war.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported by Venezuelan Political Party
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported by Venezuelan Political Party
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Venezuela on March 28 issued a bulletin supporting the just cause of the Korean people.
					 The bulletin condemned the U.S. and its followers for staging the largest-ever saber-rattling for a war against the DPRK for the purpose of threatening the heroic Korean people who are stubbornly struggling to defend the sovereignty of the country and nation and for escalating tension and bringing clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It said that the bureau, aware of the escalating danger of war provocation moves by the U.S. imperialists on the Korean peninsula, affirmed the common efforts for defending world peace and ensuring the happiness of mankind and extended full support and solidarity to the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK government and the Korean people.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to withdraw all kinds of weapons of mass destruction.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Peru
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the Entire Nation Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country" was published in pamphlet by the Grafica A. J. Hnos Publishing House of Peru on April 1 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on August 18, Juche 79 (1990), indicates the ways of achieving national reunification.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed by the Maritime Territorial branch of the All-Russia Women's Council "Hope of Russia" on April 7.
					 T. N. Esikova, chairwoman of the branch, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung who dedicated his whole life to the accomplishment of the cause of human independence on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in China
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in China
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- There took place a remembrance meeting of the families of those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on April 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present at the meeting were families of Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in China, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs and Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and the DPRK ambassador to China and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of the President and leader Kim Jong Il with broad smiles on their faces and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Zhang Jinlu, daughter of Zhang Weihua, said she missed the President very much with the approach of his 104th birth anniversary and could never forget the warm love the President showed for the bereaved families of Zhang Weihua as he would do his own children.
					
					 Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhon; Yu Ming, son of Li Zade; a daughter-in-law of mentor Shang Yue and a son of Feng Zhongyun expressed the expectation that the friendship between the two countries would develop down through generations, remembering the days of fatherly love shown by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Cambodia
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" was published in booklet by the Angkor Thom Publishing House of Cambodia with the approach of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decade-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and that the cause of the party is always sure to triumph. 
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 6.

articles.title: Foreign Media Introduce DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Media Introduce DPRK
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign media introduced the DPRK between March 25 and April 2.
					 An Algerian internet paper posted an article titled "Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea will confirm the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force", illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un. The article said that the DPRK makes all efforts to carry out the line under his leadership.
					
					 The Lao newspaper Vientiane Times, the Senegalese newspaper Le Populaire and radio broadcasting and internet homepage of the France-Korea Friendship Association referred to the fact that unprecedented miracles and innovations are being worked in various fields of the national economy in the period of the 70-day campaign of loyalty to make the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea the glorious one of victors.
					
					 Meanwhile, the NK NEWS of America introduced in detail the newly-built Mirae Shop and health complex.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente palestino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente palestino
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le enviara el presidente del Estado de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, con motivo del Dia del Sol y del 50o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre los dos paises. 
					El embajador palestino en la RPDC, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, lo entrego este lunes al canciller coreano Ri Su Yong.

articles.title: Ceremonia de juramento de oficiales y soldados del EPC con motivo del Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Ceremonia de juramento de oficiales y soldados del EPC con motivo del Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, tuvo lugar el dia 11 en la plaza del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan la ceremonia de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea para rendir homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y jurar la fidelidad al Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					A la ocasion asistieron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Myong Su y otros miembros de mando del EPC, los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas, y los cadetes de las academias militares a todos los niveles. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje postumo a los Generalisimos ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El recordo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung concibio la inmortal idea Juche, la del Songun, condujo a la victoria las dos guerras revolucionarias, la revolucion social de varias etapas y la construccion socialista y asi convirtio la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la potencia socialista caracterizada por la independencia, autarquia y la autodefensa.
					
					Continuo que el Dirigente desarrollo con sus energicas actividades revolucionarias del Songun la RPDC en la invicta potencia ideo-politica y pais poseedor de armas nucleares y abrio con sus incansables esfuerzos patrioticos y abnegados la nueva era de prosperidad de la patria. 
					
					Enfatizo en que seran eternas las imborrables proezas de los Generalisimos que al recorrer el camino de la ardua revolucion del Songun, llevo a la maxima altura la dignidad del partido, el Estado, el ejercito y el pueblo y preparo el firme fundamento para el avance victorioso y el radiante futuro de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Insistio en enaltecer a los Generalisimos y apoyar con fidelidad la orientacion del Mariscal para adelantar la victoria final. 
					
					Luego, se realizo el desfile de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, aereas y antiaereas del EPC, los cadetes de las academias militares a todos los niveles y los alumnos de las escuelas revolucionarias.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo el estado de trabajo en el Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae.
					Recorriendo varios lugares del complejo como el taller de montaje de locomotoras electricas, el de paileria, el de procesamiento no. 1, etc. para enterarse en detalles del estado de fabricacion de locomotoras electricas y reparacion de vagones.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno, se dieron enfasis en la mision e importancia encargadas por el complejo en acelerar la modernizacion de vias ferroviarias y resolver los pendientes problemas de transportacion de cargas.
					
					Ademas, se tomaron medidas necesarias a realizar con vistas al futuro la modernizacion del complejo, adornar vistosamente las locomotoras electricas y vagones y solucionar los materiales de acero y la electricidad necesarias a la rama de transportacion ferroviaria.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier analizo el estado de produccion y gestion de la Fabrica de Electrodos y otras unidades de la ciudad de Nampho y tomo las medidas necesarias.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes festejan dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Un como lider de partido y Estado
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes festejan dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Un como lider de partido y Estado
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 11 los bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes en homenaje al 4o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el supremo cargo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado.
					En las explanadas frente al Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang, el Arco de Triunfo y otros lugares de esta capital comenzaron los bailes con la interpretacion de las canciones "Nuestro companero Kim Jong Un" y "Jubilo del pueblo". 
					
					Al bailar al compas de las canciones "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo", "Pais del pueblo", etc., los bailantes expresaron la gran veneracion y agradecimiento hacia el Mariscal quien realiza los suenos e ideales del pueblo. 
					
					Las canciones como "La juventud y la valentia", "Jovenes, enaltezcamos a nuestro Partido" y "Marcha de la juventud coreana" aumentaron el ambiente festivo.
					
					El mismo dia, los bailes se efectuaron en todas las capitales provinciales, ciudades y distritos del pais.

articles.title: Mujeres festejan dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Un como lider de partido y Estado
articles.content:
Mujeres festejan dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Un como lider de partido y Estado
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en la explanada del Arco de Triunfo el baile de las funcionarias e integrantes de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea en celebracion del 4o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El baile comenzo con la cancion "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo". 
					
					Las bailantes dedicaron la maxima gloria y las mas calurosas felicitaciones al Mariscal quien conduce a la unica senda de la victoria el gran partido y gran potencia Paektusan.
					
					Al bailar al compas de las canciones "Pais del pueblo", "Cuatro estaciones de Pyongyang", etc., demostraron el aspecto feliz de las mujeres coreanas que disfrutan de vida digna como duenas del pais y se encargan de una rueda de la revolucion bajo la guia del partido.

articles.title: Respondera con implacable ataque preventivo nuclear, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Respondera con implacable ataque preventivo nuclear, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- En la Peninsula Coreana se crea la tension no vista en la historia y esta inminente el peligro de guerra nuclear.
					Al respecto, el periodico argelino El Khabar senala que debido a los ejercicios militares conjuntos desarrollados cada ano por los Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea en la Peninsula Coreana, la situacion regional estaba tensa siempre, pero es la primera vez la peor situacion como este ano.
					
					Prosigue que la causa de dicha tension reside en que los simulacros de este ano tienen el objeto de atentar la Suprema Direccion del Norte.
					
					El presidente del Consejo Mundial de la Paz revelo que EE.UU. y sus aliados persiguen el objetivo de derribar a la fuerza el regimen socialista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, lo cual deviene el eslabon de la materializacion de la estrategia de EE.UU. para dominar Asia y el plan de guerra contra los paises independientes.
					
					El presidente de la Organizacion de Propaganda Islamica Al Hadi de Iran condeno que la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. contra la RPDC no fueron iniciados ayer ni hoy, sino son las imprudentes maniobras agresoras y amenazantes que se le imponen casi cada dia durante decenios.
					
					Todo esto es la evaluacion unanime de la sociedad internacional sobre el caracter agresivo y la gravedad de los ejercicios militares conjuntos de EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					Los simulacros de guerra nuclear que EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea desarrollan movilizando los grandes efectivos militares y todos los bienes estrategicos nucleares, tienen la maxima envergadura en la historia y amenazan gravemente la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					En particular, la gravedad reside en que ellos se perpetran bajo el objeto de realizar el atroz intento criminal contra la Suprema Direccion de la RPDC, totalidad del destino, futuro y vida del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Se cometieron abiertamente la "operacion de avance al interior del Norte", la "operacion de ocupacion en Pyongyang", la "operacion de decapitacion" y el "entrenamiento de golpe preciso".
					
					Tal locura imprudente de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos es el mas abierto desafio frontal a nuestra maxima dignidad y la declaracion de guerra a la RPDC.
					
					La realidad muestra claramente donde esta la causa de la fase de guerra muy tirante dada en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Eso se debe de rabo a cabo a los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea y la politica hostil de la Casa Blanca contra la RPDC encaminados a atreverse a atentar la Suprema Direccion de la revolucion coreana.
					
					A fin de ocultar el intento agresivo de la administracion norteamericana de "extirpar" la RPDC que avanza con pasos firmes enarbolando la bandera de independencia y preparar el trampolin favorable a la toma de la heguemonia regional, EE.UU. convierte lo blanco en lo negro como si la agravacion de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana se debiera a la posesion de las armas nucleares por parte de la RPDC.
					
					Nuestra posesion de las armas nucleares es la merecida medida de autodefensa frente a la odiosa amenaza militar de EE.UU. que perjudica gravemente la dignidad y el honor de la RPDC y el derecho a vivir del pueblo coreano.
